value:
$WmMPID_ハロワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Halloween18,Face|OK, they're here! Ready? Just like we
planned! Let's go, every— Huh...
Anyone seen Dorcas?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロゼロ,ch05_11_Zero_M_Halloween18,Face|Oh, he wandered off mumbling
something about his wife, or candy,
or... Who knows with that guy.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロミルラ,ch08_09_Myrrh_F_Halloween18,Face|Oh, that puts me in the mood for
some more candy...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカゲロウ,ch05_13_Kagerou_F_Halloween18,Face|If we win this tournament, we'll
receive all the candy we desire. That
is our mission. Now, prepare.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Halloween18,Face|All right. Let's give it all we've got,
everyone!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Commander Anna, we did it! We won
the tournament's prize pumpkin! But
aside from that...$k$pThey were kind enough to give us all
these vegetables, too! Oh, I can't
wait to roast these...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Sharena, you're drooling on the
pumpkin...$k$pBut you're right. They were awfully
kind to give us those vegetables as
well. I may even be moved to tears!$k$pWe cannot let their kindness go
unrewarded. Let's help them with the
rest of the festival!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Great idea, Commander! This is going
to be so much fun!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|My eyes have finally been opened.
We need to focus on more than just
earning some quick money.$k$pWe need to cultivate relationships,
just as farmers cultivate their land.
We'll grow our own vegetables!$k$pThe entire Order and all the Heroes
can help harvest the bounty of the
land. The ration shortage is over!$k$pWe're going to be totally self-
sufficient from now on.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Now, that's a great plan, Commander!
I've always wanted to try my hand at
growing crops.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|And if we have any leftovers, we'll
sell them in town. It'll be our way of
giving something back to the people.$k$pWe'll use the profits to replenish our
fields...and then we can purchase
more farmland.$k$pMaybe hire some extra hands to help
tend the fields while the Heroes are
out fighting...$k$pBefore you know it, we'll have a
whole new income source!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Commander Anna... You just went
from grateful and enlightened to...
well, back to your old self.$k$pI guess I shouldn't be surprised, but
it all happened so quickly this
time.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Well, let's get back to helping out
with the harvest festival,
$Nu.$k$p$Sbs150|
